thread.title: ABC apologizes for mixing up video of Indian actresses
thread.title_full: ABC apologizes for mixing up video of Indian actresses

title: ABC apologizes for mixing up video of Indian actresses
text: > Entertainment ABC apologizes for mixing up video of Indian actresses FILE - In this Aug. 4, 2015 file photo, Priyanka Chopra poses at the Disney ABC Television Group party during the 2015 Television Critics Association Summer Press Tour in Beverly Hills, Calif. ABC’s “Nightline” is apologizing for confusing new network star Priyanka Chopra with another Indian actress. The news magazine aired a feature earlier this week about Chopra, the star of ABC’s new drama “Quantico.” A video shot supposedly showing Chopra in the Miss World pageant was actually Yukta Mookhey, who won the crown in 1999. Chopra was the 2000 Miss World winner. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File)
